goal:
The Municipality de Ponta Delgada is a local power, aligned in the terms of the Portuguese Constitution. It seeks to pursuit the interests of its own population. Its powers and internal organisation are regulated in terms of the Law, in harmony with the principle of administrative decentralization.
The objectives and mission of the municipalities are within these areas:
- Local and urban equipment:
- Energy;
- Transports and Education
- Heritage, culture and science;
- Free times and sports;
- Healthcare
- Social action
- Housing
- Civil Protection
- Environment
- Sewerages
- Consumer's defence
- Promotions of development
- Spatial and urban planning
- Municipal Police
- External Cooperation

The Municipality of Ponta Delgada has the purpose and mission of work on behalf of its citizens in the following areas:
- Economic and financial management;
- Promotion of cultural and tourist animation
- Territorial intervention and local constructions;
- Non discrimination policies
- Promotion of investment and jobs
- Organization and modernization of its own administration
- Quality and administration transparency
- Education
- Improve its brand, image, communication and informations technologies
- Innovation and special projects
- Mobility, accessibilities and urban traffic
- Cohesion, integrations and social inclusion
- Promotion of health and sound life habits
- Urban and spatial planning
- Low carbon energy policies, environment, green spaces and animal life
- Agenda XXI
- Rehabilitations of the urban tissue.
